briefTitle: Does Plasma Reduce Bleeding in Patients Undergoing Invasive Procedures

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Hemoglobin Level
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from pre-procedure hemoglobin to lowest within 2 days after procedure

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Red Blood Cell Transfusions
outcomeMeasures.description: Differences in number of units of red blood cell transfusions between the two study arms

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Transfusion Associated Cardiac Overload (TACO)
outcomeMeasures.description: Difference in rates between the two study arms

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Transfusion Related Acute Lung Injury (TRALI).
outcomeMeasures.description: Difference in rates between the two study arms

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Major Bleed
outcomeMeasures.description: 2g/dL or greater fall in hemoglobin level

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in International Normalized Ratio (INR) Level Post Procedure
Number of Participants With ICU Admission
outcomeMeasures.description: new admission to the intensive care unit
